meanings.definition: Used to express agreement or affirmation.
meanings.sent1: Yessir, I will definitely be there on time.
meanings.sent2: She said 'yessir' when asked if she wanted more dessert.
meanings.sent3: Yessir, I agree with you completely!
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for the project was like a loud 'yessir' echoing in the room.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered with a resounding 'yessir' at the end of the speech.

meanings.definition: Used as a polite or respectful way of addressing a man.
meanings.sent1: The young boy addressed the elderly man as 'yessir'.
meanings.sent2: He always responds with a 'yessir' when talking to his boss.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child teased his friend by calling him 'yessir'.
meanings.sent4: In the military, 'yessir' is a common way to show respect to superiors.
meanings.sent5: The wise old man smiled kindly at the young boy and said, 'Yessir, how can I help you today?'
